H0.text: creating appropriation bills falls under which power of congress. Regulating Commerce

H1.text: creating appropriation bills falls under which power of congress. Providing for the Common Defense

H2.text: creating appropriation bills falls under which power of congress. Declaring War

H3.text: creating appropriation bills falls under which power of congress. raising revenue

A4.text: Accordingly, any bill may originate in either house of Congress, except for a revenue bill, which may originate only in the House of Representatives.

A5.text: Congress may not, by revenue or commerce legislation, give preference to ports of one state over those of another; neither may it require ships from one state to pay duties in another.
